name: Please , Mind The Gap
description:
This is my entry for #simmerjam its a very simple game where you control the ball by tap on the screen. You have to keep it bouncing and try to go though the Box with the same colour. 

Tap to keep the ball bounching
Ball is moving the direction you tap as well.

How to Play

tap the screen to make the ball bounce

Control the direction the ball moves by tap the location on the screen you want the all to bounce towards.

Break the blocks by matching the color of your ball

Avoid letting the ball go out of the screen or hit the different color blocks
